Node.Text: We're going to the lobby.
Where are you going today?
We're seeing a movie. And we're actually a bit late for it.
We're a bit late for a movie! I'm taking Thomas to see "The Violet Revenant", it's a new ghost-thriller film.
I haven't seen a motion picture before, let alone a paranormal one. It should be fun, though.
Any updates on Alex, Thomas?
No, not really.
I noticed her whispering something to her tape recorder yesterday while standing outside Virginia's door. I hope Charles was the last victim in this mess...
Could you make out what she was saying?
I'm not sure, but it sounded like she kept saying "next". That's why I think Alex can't be trusted.
Why were you on Virginia's floor, Thomas?
Let's change the subject, shall we?
Sometimes, I patrol the floors of the apartments. It helps me calm down at night, and I like to think I'm protecting the other residents.
That's a very noble pursuit.
I like to think so.
Lucy, have you spoken with Caroline recently?
...No, I haven't, but I still don't trust her.
No, but I was speaking to Virginia yesterday, and she told me that Caroline has been acting off for a reason...
You know that floral smell that was everywhere last week? Well, Caroline goes to the florist every week! She could be leaving that smell everywhere!
Node.Hint: It seems that Caroline has a strong connection with flowers.

Node.Text: Trust me, this is all her doing! As soon as she's gone, everyone here will be safe again.
You sound very certain of her intentions.
We've all dealt with ill-intentioned people, operator. Some of us just know how to sort them out better.
Enjoy the film. (end conversation)
We will. Thank you for the ride.
Yes. Stay warm.
